Head.title: Native Decentralized Finance for Bitcoin
Head.desc: A blockchain dedicated to fast, intelligent and transparent decentralized financial services, accessible by everyone.

Header.title: Connecting old and new worlds
Header.desc: A blockchain dedicated to fast, intelligent and transparent decentralized financial services, accessible by everyone.

ReadyForFlexibilitySection.label: READY FOR FLEXIBILITY
ReadyForFlexibilitySection.title: DeFi MetaChain the upgrade
ReadyForFlexibilitySection.descParaOne: DeFi MetaChain is an EVM-compatible blockchain that uses Proof of Authority (POA) and runs in parallel with the Native DeFiChain blockchain.
ReadyForFlexibilitySection.descParaTwo: Read through the documentation to get started with deploying next generation DeFi applications on DeFi MetaChain.

EcosystemSection.title: Constant evolution to build, deliver and outperform

cards.desc: Access decentralized assets with collateral in your vault.

SolutionSection.title: The Post-Fintech Revolution
SolutionSection.desc: From trust-based to trust-less, decentralized finance overcomes what Fintech could not solve in traditional finance.

Variety.title: Variety
Variety.desc: Wide range of crypto-economic financial operations.

Throughput.title: Throughput
Throughput.desc: Unparalleled high transaction throughput for all transactions.

Development.title: Development
Development.desc: Rapidly create a variety of DeFi apps on one chain.

Governance.title: Governance
Governance.desc: Reliable decentralized governance, on and off-chain.

Immutability.title: Immutability
Immutability.desc: Immutable by anchoring to the Bitcoin blockchain.

FunctionsSection.title: Designed and engineered for decentralized finance dApps.

Lending.title: Lending
Lending.desc: Borrow and lend through collateralized systems.

WrappedToken.title: Wrapping of tokens
WrappedToken.desc: Work with a variety of crypto-assets, directly, on-chain.

Oracles.title: Pricing oracles
Oracles.desc: Collect data from other chains and non-crypto markets.

Transferable.title: Transferable debts and receivables
Transferable.desc: Work with transparency not possible with institutions.

Debt.title: Non-collateralized debt
Debt.desc: Loans based on reputation and verifiable credentials.

Tokenization.title: Asset tokenization
Tokenization.desc: Tokenize equity, real estate, and other holdings.

Dividends.title: Distribution of dividends
Dividends.desc: Automatic investment payouts with smart contracts.

BuiltOnBitcoinSection.title: Built-on-bitcoin
BuiltOnBitcoinSection.desc: DeFiChain marries the best of Proof-of-Stake, with the security and immutability of Bitcoin.

DistributionSection.title: Decentralized and distributed
DistributionSection.desc: The DeFiChain community runs more than 10,000 masternodes which are distributed globally.

BlockchainFeatureSection.title: Designed for Decentralized Finance
BlockchainFeatureSection.subtitle: NON-TURING-COMPLETE BLOCKCHAIN
BlockchainFeatureSection.desc: DeFiChain offers comprehensive functionality tailored to the needs of the Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) community, prioritizing simplicity, rapid throughput, and security.

THROUGHPUT.desc: Unparalleled high transaction throughput for all transactions.
